title: IDragOperator.AddComponent
description: Adds a component to the list of components to drag.
signature:
System.Boolean AddComponent( 
   System.Object
PDisp
,
   System.Boolean
AppendFlag
)

parameters.name: PDisp
parameters.description: Component to add to the list

parameters.name: AppendFlag
parameters.description: True to append the component to the list, false to clear the list before adding the component

returns: True if successful, false for failure; fixed components always return false (see Remarks )
remarks: Components that are constrained via mates are not considered fixed.
